name: Bane NOR SF
goal:
Bane NOR SF is the Norwegian rail infrastructure manager from 1 January 2017, performing the function held until that date by Jernbaneverket (JBV).
Bane NOR SF is in charge of the construction, maintenance and operations of the Norwegian railway network.
euInitiatives: Bane NOR SF participates in PRIME as a member of EIM. Sometimes Bane NOR staff participates in the working groups of ERA, nominated by EIM.
